info.name: Twitch Flat Dark & Clean
info.description: Flat Dark & Clean skin for Twitch. Works well with FFZ. Works fine with BTTV.
info.additionalInfo:
v.0.2 Recoded. Super basic now.
v.0.1.5 Added support for clips.twitch.tv

data.title: Fix the Flat style so it works with the new Twitch interface and dark mode
